items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t like girls who wear a lot of makeup.
The man who held up the liquor store wore a mask.
The only ones who know for sure are Tom and Mary.
Tom started learning French when he was thirteen.
Tom started screaming at me for no reason at all.
Tom stayed on the bus, but everyone else got off.
Tom suspected Mary was the one who had done that.
Tom and Mary are always at each other\'s throats.
Tom is one of Boston\'s most successful athletes.
Tom told me that he needed to buy a new computer.
Tom told me that I should eat at that restaurant.
Tom told me that he was planning to go to Boston.
Tom took care of our dog while we were in Boston.
I\'ve found some of the things I was looking for.
I\'ve got a lot of stories that I could tell you.
I\'ve lost thirty pounds since I started my diet.
Why didn\'t you tell me you knew how to fix this?
Why didn\'t you tell me you were going to Boston?
Do you really think that you\'re fooling anybody?
Look, if you still want to go, I won\'t stop you.
